channel.description: Recent content in data distribution on Pedro P. Santos

item.title: From concentrability coefficients to maximum state entropy exploration
item.description: We provide an intuitive explanation as to why maximum entropy data distributions are minimax optimal for approximate value-iteration algorithms in the face of uncertainty regarding the underlying Markov decision process (MDP). We also investigate connections between such minimax optimal solutions and maximum state entropy exploration methods.
